statements: SELECT * FROM MarinePollutionData WHERE region_name = 'North Sea'
SELECT region_name, pollution_level FROM MarinePollutionData ORDER BY pollution_level DESC
SELECT AVG(pollution_level) as average_pollution FROM MarinePollutionData
SELECT region_id, region_name FROM MarinePollutionData WHERE pollution_level > 5
SELECT region_name, pollution_level FROM MarinePollutionData WHERE pollution_level BETWEEN 3 AND 7
SELECT region_id, region_name, pollution_level FROM MarinePollutionData WHERE pollution_level > 5 ORDER BY region_name ASC
SELECT region_name, AVG(pollution_level) AS avg_pollution FROM MarinePollutionData GROUP BY region_name HAVING AVG(pollution_level) > 3
SELECT DISTINCT region_name FROM MarinePollutionData WHERE region_name LIKE '%Pacific%'
SELECT * FROM MarinePollutionData WHERE region_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT region_name, pollution_level FROM MarinePollutionData ORDER BY pollution_level DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM marine_regions;
SELECT region_name FROM marine_regions;
SELECT region_id, region_name FROM marine_regions;
SELECT * FROM pollution_levels WHERE pollution_type = 'Oil Spill';
SELECT * FROM pollution_levels ORDER BY pollution_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM marine_regions WHERE region_name = 'Atlantic Ocean';
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM marine_regions ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT region_name, pollution_type, pollution_level FROM marine_regions JOIN pollution_levels ON marine_regions.region_id = pollution_levels.region_id WHERE pollution_type = 'Oil Spill';
SELECT region_name, MAX(pollution_level) AS max_pollution_level FROM marine_regions JOIN pollution_levels ON marine_regions.region_id = pollution_levels.region_id GROUP BY region_name;
SELECT region_name, AVG(pollution_level) AS avg_pollution_level FROM marine_regions JOIN pollution_levels ON marine_regions.region_id = pollution_levels.region_id WHERE region_name = 'Pacific Ocean';
SELECT * FROM Marine_Regions;
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM Marine_Regions ORDER BY region_name ASC;
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM Marine_Regions WHERE region_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM Pollution_Levels WHERE pollution_level > 50;
SELECT region_name, MAX(pollution_level) AS max_pollution_level FROM Marine_Regions JOIN Pollution_Levels ON Marine_Regions.region_id = Pollution_Levels.region_id GROUP BY region_name;
SELECT region_id, region_name FROM Marine_Regions WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM Marine_Regions ORDER BY region_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Pollution_Levels WHERE pollution_level > 100;
SELECT region_name, pollution_level FROM Marine_Regions INNER JOIN Pollution_Levels ON Marine_Regions.region_id = Pollution_Levels.region_id;
SELECT cause_description, MAX(pollution_level) AS max_pollution_level FROM Pollution_Causes JOIN Pollution_Levels ON Pollution_Causes.cause_id = Pollution_Levels.record_id GROUP BY cause_description;
SELECT * FROM regions;
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM regions ORDER BY region_id DESC;
SELECT region_name FROM regions WHERE region_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM pollution_levels WHERE pollution_level > 50;
SELECT pollutant_name, data_value FROM pollutants JOIN pollutant_data ON pollutants.pollutant_id = pollutant_data.pollutant_id;
SELECT * FROM regions;
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM regions ORDER BY region_name DESC;

SELECT regions.region_name, pollutants.pollutant_name, pollutant_data.data_value FROM regions JOIN pollution_levels ON regions.region_id = pollution_levels.region_id JOIN pollutant_data ON pollution_levels.pollution_id = pollutant_data.pollution_id JOIN pollutants ON pollutant_data.pollutant_id = pollutants.pollutant_id WHERE pollutant_data.data_value > 50;

SELECT regions.region_name, AVG(pollutant_data.data_value) AS avg_data_value FROM regions JOIN pollution_levels ON regions.region_id = pollution_levels.region_id JOIN pollutant_data ON pollution_levels.pollution_id = pollutant_data.pollution_id GROUP BY regions.region_name HAVING avg_data_value > 30;
SELECT region_id, COUNT(pollution_id) AS num_pollutions FROM pollution_levels GROUP BY region_id HAVING num_pollutions > 2;
SELECT * FROM Region;
SELECT region_id, region_name FROM Region ORDER BY region_id DESC;
SELECT r.region_id, r.region_name, p.pollution_level FROM Region AS r JOIN PollutionLevel AS p ON r.region_id = p.region_id;
SELECT p.source_name, m.measurement_value FROM PollutionSource AS p JOIN Measurements AS m ON p.source_id = m.source_id;

SELECT r.region_name, AVG(m.measurement_value) AS average_measurement FROM Region AS r JOIN RegionData AS rd ON r.region_id = rd.region_id JOIN Measurements AS m ON rd.measurement_id = m.measurement_id GROUP BY r.region_name;
SELECT * FROM RegionData WHERE region_id = 1 ORDER BY region_data_id DESC;

SELECT Region.region_name, PollutionLevel.pollution_level, Measurements.measurement_value FROM Region JOIN PollutionLevel ON Region.region_id = PollutionLevel.region_id JOIN Measurements ON PollutionLevel.pollution_id = Measurements.pollution_id;

SELECT Region.region_id, Region.region_name, PollutionLevel.pollution_id, PollutionLevel.pollution_level, Measurements.measurement_id, Measurements.measurement_value FROM Region, PollutionLevel, Measurements WHERE Region.region_id = PollutionLevel.region_id AND PollutionLevel.pollution_id = Measurements.pollution_id AND Measurements.measurement_value > 50 ORDER BY Region.region_name, PollutionLevel.pollution_level;

SELECT Region.region_name, PollutionLevel.pollution_level, Measurements.measurement_value FROM Region INNER JOIN PollutionLevel ON Region.region_id = PollutionLevel.region_id INNER JOIN Measurements ON PollutionLevel.pollution_id = Measurements.pollution_id WHERE Measurements.measurement_value < 30 ORDER BY Measurements.measurement_value ASC;

SELECT Region.region_name, PollutionLevel.pollution_level, Measurements.measurement_value FROM Region JOIN PollutionLevel ON Region.region_id = PollutionLevel.region_id JOIN Measurements ON PollutionLevel.pollution_id = Measurements.pollution_id WHERE Region.region_id IN (2, 3) ORDER BY Region.region_name ASC, PollutionLevel.pollution_level DESC;
